products.title: DJI Mavic 2 Pro Drone
products.desc: The Mavic 2 Pro features a 20MP Hasselblad L1D-20c gimbal camera, with a 1″ CMOS sensor. The camera features an adjustable f/2.8 to f/11 aperture, support for a 10-bit Dlog-M color profile, and 4K 10-bit HDR video capture.
